channel.title: houdini on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist
channel.description: Recent content in houdini on Aaron McKinley Swindell | Game Developer & Artist

item.title: unwritten words
item.description: i think i need to start documenting more things in this log… working on the second terrain and i realised i couldn’t really remember the exact workflow i used, just a couple notes on the polygon count that were actually misleading after digging into the old project files.

item.title: terrestrial research
item.description: been looking into procedurally generating desert landscapes and generally brushing up on my terrain skills in general. hard to believe i was already two versions behind when i made the landstrip for the first planet haven’t discovered anything immediately useful, but maybe something i can put to use for one of the later planets
